title: Vegetarian pasta salad with rocket
ingredients: ['500g farfalle pasta', '6 tablespoons olive oil', '2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', '1 tablespoon honey', '1 tablespoon prepared mustard', '10 fresh basil leaves, coarsely chopped', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '2 handfuls rocket leaves, cut into bite-sized pieces', '20 cherry tomatoes, cut in half', '220g mozzarella cheese, diced', '50g roasted pine nuts']
